inclusion.criterion: homogeneous for number and sex of the subjects
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: supplementation with probiotic containing Bifidobacterium breve B632 and Bifidobacterium breve BR03
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: placebo for a total of 2 months of treatment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: standard diet according to routine care and practice
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: dietary restriction: 55-60% of carbohydrates, 25-30% lipids and 15% proteins
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: physical activity: all subjects will receive general recommendations about performing physical activity
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: randomization: Participants will be randomly assigned in a 1:1 to probiotic intervention group or placebo group
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: timing: Patients will be evaluated firstly at time of enrollment (V0) and, at the end of the first part of study (Study 1, V1)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: anthropometric measures: height, weight, body mass index (BMI), waist and hip circumferences
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: biochemical evaluations: CBC with formula, serum insulin-like growth factor 1 (IGF1), 25-hydroxy (OH) vitamin D, uric acid, alkaline phosphatase, ACTH, cortisol, TSH, fT4
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: biochemical evaluations: aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), AST-to-ALT ratio
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Adverse reactions to the product or component of the product
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Genetic obesity (Prader Willi syndrome, Down syndrome)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Chronic diseases, hepatic or gastroenterological diseases
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 34-year-old woman from Jordan with general and non-specific bones and joints pain. Her past medical and drug history are unremarkable.
